flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
This guide will teach you how deck out your car with an EZ-EL Wire Car Kit. For more cool ideas check out https://ez-el.com/tutorials!

The EZ-EL Wire Kit you will need for this project can be purchased here.

Enter coupon code MAKEcar at checkout for a discount!
guide.introduction_rendered:
This guide will teach you how deck out your car with an EZ-EL Wire Car Kit. For more cool ideas check out https://ez-el.com/tutorials!

The EZ-EL Wire Kit you will need for this project can be purchased here.

Enter coupon code MAKEcar at checkout for a discount!

Relevant parts
  • Ez-El 10’ Green El Wire + Car Inverter
  • Ez-El 25’ Green Electroluminescent Wire
  • Scotch tape
  • Galvanized wire
Tools
  • Heavy Duty Side Wire Cutter Plier
  • Scissors
  • Tekton 3504 Precision Needle Nose Pliers

parts.text: Ez-El 10’ Green El Wire + Car Inverter

lines.text: Here is what your car's interior will look like!
lines.text_raw: Here is what your car's interior will look like!

lines.text: Plan out the design of the EL wire by mounting the EL wire onto the car with Scotch tape.
lines.text_raw: Plan out the design of the EL wire by mounting the EL wire onto the car with Scotch tape.

lines.text: Note: 10 ft El Wire was not enough to fit my dashboard, so it is recommended to use 25 ft EZ-EL Wire.
lines.text_raw: Note: 10 ft El Wire was not enough to fit my dashboard, so it is recommended to use 25 ft EZ-EL Wire.

lines.text: Once you've designed the shape you wish on your car, cut about 2 inches of galvanized wire and twist the ends tightly together around the wire.
lines.text_raw: Once you've designed the shape you wish on your car, cut about 2 inches of galvanized wire and twist the ends tightly together around the wire.

lines.text: Use pliers to help you twist so it's easier on the tips of your fingers.
lines.text_raw: Use pliers to help you twist so it's easier on the tips of your fingers.

lines.text: Use a wire cutter to cut the excess wire.
lines.text_raw: Use a wire cutter to cut the excess wire.

lines.text: Continue this process throughout your design.
lines.text_raw: Continue this process throughout your design.

lines.text: Mount the EL wire onto the car following the mounting lines of the car. Begin removing the tape as you proceed throughout the design.
lines.text_raw: Mount the EL wire onto the car following the mounting lines of the car. Begin removing the tape as you proceed throughout the design.

lines.text: Put the bass response of the Car Kit Inverter at a low setting to allow bass to respond.
lines.text_raw: Put the bass response of the Car Kit Inverter at a low setting to allow bass to respond.

lines.text: Now turn on the EL Wire, turn up the jams, and enjoy!
lines.text_raw: Now turn on the EL Wire, turn up the jams, and enjoy!

guide.summary: Install EZ-EL wire in your car. Impress your friends right when they hop in! And the wire's built-in music-response technology is a crowd pleaser.
guide.title: EZ-EL Wire Car Kit

tools.text: Heavy Duty Side Wire Cutter Plier
